One Project With Outgoing Addtion

Since:
Last Modified: $Date: 2004/04/19 15:52:45 $

Test Steps:

  1. Commit a project
  2. Release the project
  3. Make sure map file is updated and committed
  4. Add a file to the project
  5. Right click the project
  6. Click Replace With->Released

Expected Results:

  1. Confirm Overwrite message dialog shows up
  2. Local project is replaced with the released one if answer "Yes"
